title: pxOS AI Primitive Schema
description: Defines the strict JSON format for AI-generated primitives for pxOS.

feature.description: A brief description of the feature being implemented.

primitives.description: An array of pxOS primitive commands.

label.description: The label for a DEFINE command.

addr.description: The memory address for a DEFINE or WRITE command.

byte.description: The byte value for a WRITE command.

comment.description: A comment associated with the command.
